item.title: Show storage on all Virtual Guests
item.description: require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' # Create a SoftLayer API client object client = SoftLayer::Client.new() account_service = client['SoftLayer_Account'] # We will retrieve the additional information for each VSI: mask = 'mask[id,hostname,blockDevices[id,mountType,diskImage[capacity]]]' begin # getVirtualGuests() will get all the VSIs that an account has. result = account_service.object_mask(mask).getVirtualGuests pp result rescue StandardError => exception puts "Unable to get the VSIs: #{exception}" end
